projectDesc.p: This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

div.ab: Dhandhanggula //0//oṃ awig̈nanam astu ya nama siḍĕm //0//

lg.l: yena kramra sapa wogan iku tĕmbe
hana make ki siƞamada hali tan. wruḥ
ø saṅ kakaṅ histri kaliḥ hamukti
ø ƞ kadaṅ wṛgane tan ana sudi
duṙgama ḃaya kewĕḥ wyaṙ tan kahisṭi
hanṣĕl. rag̈a dan liƞe katuwun. wakisun
ø kunaṅ yen ana kĕsĕliṅƞ ati
kapaƞgiḥ saṅ ta ligiḥ riṅ made,
bageya saṅ tami ḍataṅ mara/ ke,
sami haliƞgiḥ, ki/ habĕt liṅnya taken,
ø tuhu tan. wikan wṛti/nta kami
ø haƞuśi ka/daṅ wṛga tan ana sudi
ki paƞuwusann aliṅ haƞṛs. raśaniƞ a/ti
tan lagna ki baru mitaṙ lakw ag̈e,
ø tan. wuwusĕn. denya bwuksa/ prapti

ø ka
piṅluḥ śwaranira ki waśi
ya ḍu/ḥ heman tan ana kṛtti
ø me/lik tan. haṙsa kuraṅƞ a/mukti
kitri hamriḥ saṅ kawi suka sugiḥ/ya
mo/n. ton iƞ aniṅ/ sukāniƞ amukti rame
ø pa/tya waṣa ƞoṅ kaki haƞalaṅƞi
ø sawaṅƞn ri pun i lampaḥ ka/ki
tiwas bisa lakw ayu yu tan. kneṅƞ iṣṭi
tan. kna piṇu/raṅ saṅ hatapa sakti
tan lyen kaṅ denṣadya suka wiṙyya sugiḥ
ri laku lamon tan wruḥ parani sandi
budi lupa mawa kaṙyya cipta karasmin

ø haneṅ ku
na hanunuṅgal ṣakti
salaḥ simpaṅ ciptane winor iƞ asi
haja tiniru wiku goman iṅ daraḥ
ø yen sirameta riṅ luhuṙriṅ wukiṙ
muliḥ tutuṙ/ walakā tan saṅsaya hame
ø waniḥ saṅ wruḥ wiwaraniṅƞ aji
saṅƞ atapā riṅ sukma jñana wirati

ø śakti
wiśesa riṅ brata lwiḥ
kula hilaṅ bapa riṅƞ ameka/t kadadin
haƞi si bapa haƞel mo dudu drabe
ø nora/na bapa sinpaṅƞan i kitadu
ø haliṅ saṅ tapa hasmu taƞis.
denanuƞgal. riṅ/ paƞeran., racananira riƞ ati
kadya ƞawe tkap i niƞ aƞin.
miyat/ ṣaƞ amriḥ tapa wṛs nala siƞit
ø tan. tmaṅ maƞĕ manḍag anoliḥ
syarani walika mijaḥ kadyama hamuṅ hawasul pra/ naḥnya
ø hasmu hegaṙ manaḥ tibra ki/ kin
wus katiban waṙsa piṅ tiga haliliṙ
ø lwiṙ moda heca riṅ manaḥ
sa branma paḍatƞan laḥ diƞaṙyyan ṣa tami .hu yyapupu
ki dayaka sukṣkaṙ lwiṙ kataman. ƞel.
brata ki salimut pralabda wikan iƞ apti
ø siḍĕmn ĕṅ yoga wuwusĕn maniṅ
hakĕkĕs awoṙ maras., hyaṅ puṭutt ajriḥ
duk iṅƞ a/mpaḥ satkanisun iṅƞ aṙdi
ø saṅ tapa wayaḥ sigra hudani
ø pi/ra lawasira na/ riƞ aṙda
sira si bapa maṅsa tan wruḥha
ø woṅ paƞubonan kabeḥ paḍa prapti
ø sa.. kaƞani yoga wus pra/pti
ø pada hyaṅ nini haƞumi pirik
kaṅ sawiji lwiṙ sukma wanita manis
pada hyaṅ nini hadan busana rame
hambĕda siraḥ dwa tan payatda kami
kadi kawƞan iṅ saṅƞ añaṙ tumaki
prapti wisma tan dma hucapĕn maniḥ
nora eraṅ ni taki muliḥ hanaƞis.
ø taƞiḥ yen waṙṇanĕn ṣaƞ akiki
tanpa cipta yen ṣitmon i pawestri
smimpĕna saṅ hyaṅƞ aṙka ṛp tika wƞi
ø saṅƞ adīguru ƞucap iƞ bit
ø tan lyan. bapa ḷkasṇiƞ akikin

ø lawan ma ḍapuriƞ aka
n
tanpa klṙ saṅƞ adi tuhu jatini
ø haja ta sakti bakti hyaṅ widi
hutara sunya madya kaky ana kṛti
sampun. tlas karakut iṅ babad wasit

haƞi hana dennati kacipteṅƞ ati pratijñani ruṅ sa
kadammaga wa

ta
n uniƞa śolaḥ ri lwan
hapi tan. wruḥ wisesa raga pribudi
hasmu biƞaṙ lwiḥ tan aganeƞ ati
haƞi tuƞgal. pri lkasira saṅ kili
kaṅ tanpa ƞaṙsa, yen jalu tuhan
lan woṅ lanaṅ yeku tapa purusi
budi bocaḥ satata wikan iṅƞ ariṅ

ø dibwaniṅ guna lwiṙ
tanpa cantri
ø sahan iṅ dwara jutiniṅƞ ati
ø sira saṅ kawasa mutĕṙ sandi
tan. wruḥ yen a/neṅ rag̈a wisesa.
ø laḥ tarimanĕn de ntayo lali
ya/ ta pinĕñcaṙ minaka śiniṅ bummi
ø ki surajaya mnĕṅ tanpa liṅ
yen kita haṙsa hamoṅ mendraniṅ budi
ø lamun ṣampun. swĕḥ hamoṅ budi
saṅƞ aƞeca tan. wriṅ kramma hanak mami
ø śaḥ maṙmmaniṅ manaḥ luramaris wimusata ṙcita rasa rasmini
ø pupuk munya santun lan kaḍasiḥ

ø lapas. lampaḥhe ki sura
wani
ø laḥ kakw aligiḥha ta pukulun
saṅ bagya riṅ dataṅ, hasmu kusut
ø lamon tan. jnĕk iṅ gunuṅ
ø hĕndy aƞuṙ tapa śaṅ tinut
ø ƞdi kaṅ dudokna sami la
ø nora lwan sira lwan ri sun.n

tumon. ḃakti heṅ raṙ
rw aƞon
kaṅƞ akweḥ bapa swama niṙ don
ø tan kawaṙnaha lakune riṅ ƞnu
ø śapa ta kaki namanta tanya sun
luḥ mijil manaḥ tan wriṅ kon
juraṅ ska ḥ saki tani lumaris
ø mrik ta maruta ƞambakĕn kari
lamat lamat ri tawaṅ lyiṙ kadya naƞis
kadukapiṅ wanayala prapti ba/jaran lampaḥnya hagejoṅ
ø mon rahina la pinṛm iƞ ati

ø sampun ṣalaḥ wṛ
da hanak mami
surajaya/ sun ajak mara heṅ riki
ø hadan. sḍaḥ manaḥ kaṙyya tami
wikan i naya ki daṙmakawi liṅnya ris
ø wikan i praya ki surawani
manaḥ medra sinukma panṛm iƞ ati
ø jiwa pyuḥ tuṅgal tĕmpuḥni kapti
maṅga mṛma sawƞi tan ana guliṅ
ø umnĕ kepyan pyuḥ cipta niki
baya hañaṙ gi/ta holiḥ ri/ƞ aƞawi
muṅgiṅ tṛsna sumurup i lulut asiḥ
ø hiku nate sun. duk wahu prapti
ø kaṅƞ apakṣa mily amoṅ karasme
tṛsna kadaṅ sun giṇḍalakĕn tan ṣapiḥ
ø tiḍĕmni kjĕp tan ana ta/ƞi
kajaṅ siraḥ tlĕ/s. deni luḥ hu/mijil
ø mĕṅgaḥ ƞṣaḥ tan kna haguliṅ
ø umyus. wa/spa nusap tan asari
ø rarā hanom wi/kan i parati
ø mƞĕḥ ƞṣaḥ lyiṙ tanpa galiḥ
ø siṙnani jñana hasṛṅ tan jati
sapiḥni duta laky ayu kaṅ tinoliḥh
ø haja tan eliṅ salaḥ sawiji
ri sun muliḥ haṙsa woṅ tan kapaḍan ṣaḥ
ø maṅgaḥ tan mintara sakiṅ riki
ø tan poliḥ don raga wus kagisiṙ
saṅƞ adon laƞĕn tan wruḥh i lawan

tĕmbya
pagiḥ sily asiḥ lamon pakaṙti
ø lyiṙ cantaka malaṙ dṛsni riri
ø ki wani tan. kna mṛm. sawƞi
samun adan awuƞu saṅ wanita gli
ø gĕnti tan pagat wacana mijil.
mon katmu rupane saṅ daṙma jati
ø tan ṣipi riƞ aripta/ kawi
ṣuga piluwaṅ tan lyan kaṅ denrasani
ni rutaṙja lawa ni skaṙ ni/ dosa

kaṅ sawiji liṙ sukma wani
ta manis
ø roro sanak waṙna yayaṅ tulis
ø ni rutaṙja rupa hasmu kuniṅ
ø ni tejasari ta/n lyan pinuji
ni rutaṙja ni ratna kari hi wuri
ø sampun mintaṙ saṅƞ adon karasmin
ø niṙ kula niṙ rupa niṙ prakawi
haƞiṅ tugal priḥ rupanira saṅ kawi
ø ki surajaya siye tan ĕtiṅ
ø saḥ ṣakiṅ babahan lampaḥnya la/lis
sṛtiṅ sabda ni teja hasahuṙ taƞis
lawas isun aƞeca ri sira nini
mon etaṅƞĕn iƞ aty apura siƞit
ø hagĕṅ maƞu tan lya kaṅ kahisṭi

ø
hakeḥ haṙṣa rupa tan katoliḥ
keḥni baya kewĕḥ tan ana kahisṭi
ø hasṛṅ tan pgat deni tanpa liṅ
kaknan ṣiḥ lulu/t i pawestri lwiḥ
kaṅ katoliḥ ketaṅ saṅƞ asuṅ wirage

ø prapti ju
raṅjuraṅ lampaḥ niki
kadya kon mṛma syarani pakṣi gĕṇḍiṅ
ø prapta riṅ kĕmbaṙ gwaniṅƞ aligiḥ,

haṅśo
kahasti lan taṅ kañiri putiḥ,
ø tibanniṅ jñana lwiṙ kadi kanin
ni tejasarī lwiṙ kapaƞgiḥ heṅ daṙmmi
ø ki surawani mihat waṙnaniṅ tulis.
saka wetan pun mitra budi kapalis
waṛ/g lara braṅta kasmarann iṅ budi
ø hi rajuna reren tigaṅ sasi
hapeṅ tuƞgal. deniṅƞ anamun lara siḥ
ø di kaṅ sinandya ma/kinn aƞeca,
maṙmmani sukma tatwa niṙ tanpa ganti
ø balik anĕguḥ rame ri kawi
ø sampun yadan caru wus pinaṣṭi
ø tiḍĕ/mmiṅ tṛna ta lata sumilib
laḥ ta reren sarira kara ƞliḥ
hadan kĕñaṙ hyaṅ diwakara munya ñjrit
wwantĕn dwi kanya togwā mawisik wisik
ø smu heraṅ wacana tan mijil.
ø hĕndi desa kaki/ dera hisṭi
kampiṙ ki/ surajayā niṙ saṅ tumiti
hadumm ayu riṅ maṙgga riṅ sun. lumaris
ø tan sipi ƞeliṅ samakta ƞ ambĕk ṣumakti ṇ Pastilah ingat berlagak kuat
ki surajayā tan yan paranniṅƞ ati
ø mandra ṛmĕṅ praḃa saṅ hyaṅ śasi
saya hewā tumiƞal iṅ para kili
ø tapa sana batuṙ teṅsun. yayi,
ø punapa kakaṅ ye/n sira hapti
sape namā paƞeran saṅƞ asuṅ brati
ø ḷyĕ sẗap sumaput. rasaniṅƞ ati,
ø ḍuḥ tan darana kamw aniƞali,
tan kawasa mona hamgat i taƞis.
tan. kneṅ mṛmma hasṛṅ patṣani duta,
wus kagiwaṅ tan.n eliṅ salaḥ sawiji

ø epuḥ
niṅ cipta makin arusit
ni skaṙjā hapaksa ñidra heṅ wƞi
saṅ wahu praptī kaṙyya ṛtaṅƞiƞ ati
yen tulus aṙsā petĕn saṅkaniṅƞ aśri
laḥ ta luƞa paƞeran., yen sirasiḥ
nora gawok manira riṅ woṅƞ asugiḥ,
ø saṅsaya hebuḥ tṛsnane tan sipi,
ø datann eraṅ saṅƞ amoṅ karasmin

ø tusṭa manaḥ hyaṅƞ a
naƞga midi
ø punapeṅ kakaṅ yen wantĕn kapti
ø laḥ ƞoṅ hiḍĕp sabdanira kaki,
kadya ƞipi kaṅƞ awak mareṅ saṅ tami
ø ki surajaya/ mnĕṅ tanpa liṅ
rob tan pahiƞan. yayi wtuniṅ titiṙ
ø wyaṙ kaṅ tutuṙ hilaṅ tanpa gati
ø kaṅ surajaya kaya tan kawi
yen tan tan kemutan ƞoṅ make
tan lyan kaṅ ginunĕm., nastapanku kaki

ø ḃaṅbaṅ wetan. śig̈radan ataƞi tu stasṭa ma
naḥ saṅƞ ananḍaṅ
ni skaṙjā tan marasa niƞ a
lwiṙ tatwaniṅ kusumā taṅ batuṙr adi
ni skaṙjā wwaṙ tan ana katoliḥ,
lamat lamat ṣwĕḥ titiss iƞa/du manis.
ø tanpa tmu liṅnya gojoṅƞ aris
ta narañiri ratta cina skaṙr aharawit

ø wwantĕn pada hyaṅ nini kakali
ḥ
baya wnaṅ jaluw arerenn iṅ riki
nora wi ra kan kateṅsun kaki,
nora wawahu yen ana kanḍĕgga kampiṙ
ø ni sambrama pada yyaṅ nini
ø śi da g̈ra pamuṙsi/taniṅƞ aṃṛdi
ø niṙ taṅ lampaḥ noraneṅsunn isṭi
lamon ana lwiṙ mo śukā kaṅ budi
ø tuwu rame patapan iṅ kawi
hatut maṙgga ta/n lwan kaṅ sinadya
tkapiṅ ludra kaṅƞ awa kadya beƞon aƞin
sa/ka wetan pun ṣurajayā moṅ kapti
ø ḍawuḥ heka kilen saṅ hyaṅ rawi
ṣampun dondon heḥ kaki/ denira kampiṙ
ø surupniṅ saṅ hyaṅ śiki gumanti
ø ẗi/liṅniṅ saṅ hyaṅ candra dumma kaliḥ
ø la caliḥ/niṅ jñana basamet silib.
ø ya ḍuḥ harinisun masku kaki
ø yayah edan manah iƞ akikin
rayini ra ra rinaku/l. hasmu taƞis
ki samayā sumahuṙ hawoṙ luḥ mijil
sira saṅ kataman ṣiḥ hamriḥ kapatin
ø ya ḍuḥ harininasun makwa ruśi/t
ø hadanka. lumaku śig̈ra tanpa noliḥ

lakw aglis liṙ lalayaƞan prapti parat ka
puƞkuṙr i gunuṅ
ø maƞkin tan ṣurud. didaknya hapṛgi
ramyadan busana woṅ jro paḍa krig
mwaṅ woṅ batuṙ tu/ṣṭa nuraƞaga ƞiri,
wragapaƞalasan atuṅgalan payuṅ hasraṅ munya raraƞin kĕṇḍaṅ/ goṅ
ø saṅ nata sig̈ra tan ṣurud.
hage lampaḥhi bala wus prapti ṗalasa
rob tan ṣurud. kiḥni woṅ tur adi
hanu gridanta lyan woṅ tameṅ smu
batur iƞ agatra, woṅ gaṙhajita duluṙ
n hutameṅƞga hatoḥ pyaḥ waṙnani tĕṇḍas
sig̈ra tan ṣurud. prapteṅ/ heṅ panataran
bap alaneṅ ḍaṅka lyan tan aresyari

sakeḥni saṙwy a
ndaḥ wijili ta jawi
kucĕmmiṙ saṅ hyaṅ candra baƞun rahina
praptaƞ esuk ṣaṅ hyaṅƞ aṙka humijil
lagya namun wihyaṅ tan ka/wasa ƞiri
wṛtane ki maƞuyu naƞe/kĕn. waraḥ tan/. wruḥ yen. praṅ jĕbug.waƞi para
rame kaƞ ayĕƞan. tan ana maḍani
denira wuyuṅ laḥ mintaṙ sakiraƞ iriki
ø yen ṣiḥra hasiḥ hiri sun
niṙ tan paṅrasa, nawi/ tan katakampakan.
hamusuḥhana daṙma haṛp i jro palaḥ
hagĕp kasatyaṅ ka tan. tṛṣneṅƞ urip
ø ta/n pedaḥ bineda ri kuṅ
hasmara haƞucaṅ haweḥ lulut iƞ atapa,
sadya hayu hyaṅ widy amig̈nani ƞakikin
ø saḥn.. hya kadi tanpa suṅ
myaṅ saya karasa, pawaraḥhira saṅƞ adi
yayi laḥ ta mintaṙ haƞeca ri wili
kakaṅ samono dera braṅta ƞalaḥ ruƞu
nala ta kikiƞan tan ana katoliḥ
lyan teṅkaṅ kapapag kawuri kaperiṅ pa
duk prapti jaganlu makya ƞantun antun
miyat duƞusi pareṅ roṅ priṅga noƞi
ø datan ana simpaṅƞipu/n t hadaruṅ punaṅ maṙga, praptaheṅ
ṣakṣandan mintaṙ hyaṅƞ aṙka dum kaliḥ
saṅ mundra/ sabrama nape saṅ tami
ø duḥ bagya kita saṅ tamu
ø tameṅ saṅ sipta wruḥ smu
tlas akeḥ ni prawata kaṇḍa rinatus
haƞiṅ sih aja turida ri wuwus
laƞga woṅ sun luputeṅ tula sarik
dalu deni tiwas amet datan poliḥ
maṇḍĕg maƞu mayoṅ tan wruḥ paran.
dera ṅlaƞut bapa niṙ tanpa gawe
lamon tan wruḥ kaṅsananira saṅ wiku
lampaḥ tanpa kaṙyya twas brata ƞliḥ
ya ḍuḥ dipire nora heṅ sira
ma sa śewa sogata tlas kaparan
yen aglaṙ śabda wikan i paranti
lwiḥ lemon ana pustakadi tatya lwiḥ
kaya holiḥya sapikul maṅkin kawacican manaḥ manaḥky iṅ
ø yen ana waraḥ hiri sun
ṣira saṅ jati yatuhu lila warana,
tu/hu prayatna tama/ tan. kneṅƞ uṅguṅ
ḍuḥ taƞeḥ paƞeran ranak hyaṅ kumawi
saṅ/ƞ alaƞut putus i naya sandi
waniḥ sa wruḥ tatyani śabda gati
ø punika liƞiṅra saṅ waspadeṅ tiƞal.
halaḥ deni tanpa rasa heṅƞ a/ti
tan ana ni boga tiḷm. deni prapẗi
rahi/na tatas lami saṅ hyaṅ/ƞ aṙka
yan ta/ woṅ lamajaṅ sakiḥni winih eliṅ
prapteṅƞ esuk pu/naṅ woṅ luraḥ gintiṙ
jana wetan ika wwaṅ maṅsĕḥ karuhun
dan ṣatuwuk timbul tan wruḥ raḥ niki
ø ki sora lawan ki samun

ø sampun ampĕkaṅ buru śig̈ra tama
wya daṙma hasraṅ
lyan ta kĕṇḍaṅ goṅ daṙpa gĕtu/ran.
ø sakeḥniṅ para putra, dibya karuhun
saka wetan tumahap ta buru kĕmbaṅ
woṅ kuwu kabeḥ wus ḍataṅ liƞi
rameni praṅ jbĕ kabayan i/ƞ adu,
rinupk i tṛga liṙ karuṅ tinaṇḍiṅ
haƞikal tĕwĕ kadya mor i musuḥ
hana waniḥ kaṅ kapranan/ hanuli mati
kaget kaṅ praṅ guṙnita, rusakiṅ pa/saṙ
mwaṅ woṅ daṙma kna p®ü malayu
sapiḥ ni praṅ wataṅ paḍa/ wus apiranya
liṙ syaṙga lumpaḥ goṅ/ mṛdaṅga ƞiri
ṣurajaya mulat ṣakṣat i praṅ lagi
sakeḥni para putra ḍarat riƞ nu
lumaky aglis ki sora lawan ki samun

dira tan. luwaṙ sikpi
ra titiḥ sami
saha sahuṙ pareret muni riṅ jawi
lwiṙ saṙgga lumpaḥ goṅ mṛdaƞga ƞiriṅ
ma/ ki samun hayyadoḥ lawan kami
tan ana wani hamapaga ka buru
maṅga kala hari bumi ƞoṅ tan ajriḥ
kaṅ wus luhuṅ ƞoṅ papage pribudi
lamon koduṙ saḍpa ri sun akĕmput
kaṅ pa wata tumandaṅ ka buru kĕmba

miṅgĕk miguḥ wataƞe den ka
ḍiri
mesĕm ṣaṙwy aƞayat hegaṙ ka pawestri
tuṙ tuṙ kneṅ bubuk pahumahani ciciḍil
tan wruḥ yen ciciṇḍile pati pulucat
wruḥ riṅ waṅsit ṣakeḥhi buru gumuyu
juburu jaba mwaṅ jro gusti tan kantun.
lyan ta woṅƞ ambapaṅ ƞnaƞnaƞĕn tan kari,
tan wruḥ gisiṙ wani buta, musuḥ luhuṅ
muƞal tandaṅƞe kaṭine tan ana wruḥ
praptaü madyani¥ iœnawa, taü kaü kadiwa
lalanasambu tan wruḥ ri la/wan. rowaṅ
niki duk ṣinuduk. mṛgĕgĕḥ tama takis
tĕrus anuju walikat amaḷs tan poliḥ/
ri galuga tal brahmatya toḥ pati
tlas prayatna ki sora tame smu
kaṅ praṅ wataṅ pra ḍaḍap daṙṗa gĕnturan.
ṣigg̈ra tuluṅ koniƞa dera saṅƞ aji
ṣinapiḥ tan. kna keḥni buruḥ mati/
ki sora prabawa wawayahi woṅƞ alit
wit i bojana, wak paḍa dene mati
liṙ haturu, kunaṅ siṅ buruḥ gati
ta/tune tan aprana linud ẗikṣnani kris

paḍa ƞuśi humaḥ kala huwaḥ ha
wiḥ
wṛga riḍu deni diraḋa prasi masakrak ajriḥt anu/jaḥ holiḥ woṅ/
sigiḥ pukulun kaƞ anama pun. sora
ṣa nata mawaca/na, hiḥ hanom prajurit
ki sora tan lyan kasihira saṅ prabu
tan. tlag deni kaww amiweka sabda
ø hiḥ tan makanaha ri laku
ø hamuṙwa kawƞan kam muṙwya kuṅ
ki sora lwiḥ tan ana maḍani
riṅ manimanta/ka kneṅ data kneṅ duta
kakaṅ laḥ ta niniƞali daḷm pisan
pajraḥni saṙwya sari kadya muṙwya kuṅ
saṙwy aƞituṅ sakala mlok miliṙ mwaṅ koci/ kamini yasa ka/beḥ
wwaṙ tan ketuṅ, tbĕṅniṅ/kaṅ maṙgga ƞrit
hyaü¥ aœka dum pisa/n kilyan maœmma nuli/

kadukap.
∂awu ̇ pisan pi ro pi tlu
śig̈ra prapteṅ dahā tan wuwusĕn maniṅ
ø luwaṙ tanṣaḥ rag̈a namun kapti
tan pwaliḥ don kwiniṅ wig̈ra kapaƞgiḥ
ø hasmu kepwaran rara g̈asamaya liṅ
duḥ kaṅƞ awak masa tan daḍiya
ø ritniṅ wanaƞel tan ana wani
niṙ tan lampaḥ sumilib kaṅ denulati
ø pinet i yoga nora kapaƞgiḥ
ø pira lawasi raga g̈ĕṅ brati
ø wus kalampaḥhan ṣakwe nikaṅƞ aṙdi
piraṅ wulan hasikiṙ ri kaka di
ø sampun mĕntas ki śu/rajaya glis
ø kweniṅ deśa kaṅ sun lakoni

ø ki suraja
ya mesĕm lumiriṅ
saṅka hulat saṅka wiweka riƞ ati
hapan minaṅka liṅganiṅ kaṅ sapta bu/mmi
kasayan pun mitra wikana ri tri
maṙmman iṅśun riṅ kina midĕr iṅ bu/mmi
ø nadyan piṅ sapta diwasa kaki
hagampaṅ dera śaṅ/ wikan iṅ naya
ø śinĕgw adoḥ bali lan iṅ kliṅ
saṅ sula niṙmala wruḥ śariniṅ śari
manawi tan adoḥ lawan nila putiḥ
rupane budi lagi wuyuṅƞ ṛṅ ṛyamraṙnapmap manĕmbaḥ byakta/

ø ki sura
jaya gadgada haliṅ
laḥ kari/ya ki rujakwatu sun pamit
ø tan kawaṙnnaha riṅ maṙgga pṛgi
pan wus tĕlas pamantĕsiṅ sabda gati
balikan ta leler i patapan a/diḥ
ø ṛgĕp de nta yo tan. keku
ø tann adoḥ haḍukuḥ ri sun
ø rag̈a n tan. kna winastu
tan ana riṅ wdi riƞ ati

div.ab: //0// sampuniƞ anulaṙwa kawi ri jĕṅ saṅ hyaṅƞ aṙdi kasihan imbaṅ puṙwa mandarag̈ni gĕgĕṙ i wanagaṅgu rare hanom lagi hasisinahu masaḥ kumalamaṙ ta ḋṛman ṣakaniƞ a/li tan porat pakṣa kumawi hanulis tanpa tut i sipat wṛḋaḥ ƞkṣa rasmi gitiƞĕ nĕmut gatĕl ṣampun kiraṅ puƞapura pukulun kaṅ sudy amaca lawan ṣaƞ amihaṙsa denpatuta dene/ saṅ wicakṣana saṅ kawi kara samakta rahayu kuraṅ denwuwuḥhana lwiḥ den loƞana pukulun prasadu ƞuwusan wulan ṣaḋa wuku tambiṙ haṅƞgara kasiḥ duk ṣinurat wulan nĕm
